scripts.docker:dev: docker build -f docker/dev/Dockerfile -t $npm_package_config_img:v$npm_package_version-dev . && docker tag $npm_package_config_img:v$npm_package_version-dev $npm_package_config_img:latest-dev && docker push $npm_package_config_img:v$npm_package_version-dev && docker push $npm_package_config_img:latest-dev
scripts.docker:prod: npm run prod && npm run compodoc && docker build -f docker/prod/Dockerfile -t $npm_package_config_img:v$npm_package_version . && docker tag $npm_package_config_img:v$npm_package_version $npm_package_config_img:latest && docker push $npm_package_config_img:v$npm_package_version && docker push $npm_package_config_img:latest
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch -m "Upgrade version to v%s" && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor -m "Upgrade version to v%s" && git push --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major -m "Upgrade version to v%s" && git push --tags
